title: McMaster, Kelly may leave over tensions with Trump: sources
text:
McMaster, Kelly may leave over tensions with Trump: sources Friday, February 23, 2018 - 01:53 
Longstanding friction between U.S. President Donald Trump and two top aides, the National Security Adviser and the Chief of Staff, has grown to a point that either or both might quit soon, four senior administration officials said. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
